description: Try our easy to follow Steamed Mussels & Garlic Cauliflower Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Steamed Mussels & Garlic Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over high heat. Add onion and cook for 23 minutes until softened. Add wine and mussels and cover with a lid. Steam for 2-3 minutes, shaking the pan. Uncover and stir through herbs. Serve mussels with cauliflower mash and crusty bread.
